Entry.JapaneseText: よすんだ……占いなどしなくても、 俺たちはユリスに勝つんだ、絶対に……
Entry.EnglishText: Stop that... Even without having our fortune told, I know for sure that we will defeat Yuris...

Entry.JapaneseText: 当たり前よ。 私が占ってるのはそんな事じゃない。
Entry.EnglishText: Of course I know that. That's not what I was divinating.

Entry.JapaneseText: ユリスを倒した後のこの国が、 どうなって行くのか……それを見てたのよ。
Entry.EnglishText: What I was attempting to find out... Is the direction this nation will head in after Yuris has been defeated.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……そうか。 それで、どう出たんだ？
Entry.EnglishText: ...I see. Well, what was revealed to you?

Entry.JapaneseText: 戦いが完わったら、 教えてあげるわよ……
Entry.EnglishText: I'll tell you when this battle is over...
